law.catch_line: Office quarters for county boards and district departments.
law.text: The county board of health of each county having a county department of health, and the governing body of each district department of health, shall provide an office suitably furnished for its meetings and for the conduct of its business, and conveniently located as determined by it.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2054a-12, 2054a-17.
